name: temple-player-standalone
description: Temple Player (Terry Tribute) - standalone Electron app
author: Luna Community

scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/renderer/styles && cp src/renderer/temple.html dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R src/renderer/styles/* dist/renderer/styles/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:assets
scripts.start: env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE npm run build && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron .
scripts.dev: env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE npm run build:renderer -- --watch & env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron .
